text:
@realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom The Washington Times:
Faces of the dead
This is how they lived — and what was lost when they died.

Nothing on your calendar as usual trump,
 try reading the stories of the DEAD from your failure with the Coronavirus
